global.account-center-tip: Manage and view your account settings and generate tokens.
global.context-length-exceeded: Session content is too long. Delete some or create a new session.
global.license-check-error: The current plan cannot access this feature. Please upgrade to the Premium or Team license to unlock it.
global.name: Name
global.reset-data-tip: Are you sure you want to reset all data? (Including chat and settings data)
global.service-error: Service error, please try again later.
global.title: Title
global.user-info-tip: Check and modify your user information.

account.token-expire: The token expiration time cannot be earlier than the current time.
account.usage-tip: Below is a summary of the point usage for your account. The data is updated daily (not in real-time)

auth.account-tip: First, you need to set your password in the account center.
auth.agree-privacy-policy: By clicking continue, you agree to our
auth.input-valid-email: Please enter a valid email address
auth.sign-in-link: A sign in link has been sent to your email
auth.theme-password-error: The current password cannot be the same as the new password.
auth.title: Login / Sign up

backup.key-length-error: The encryption key must be 16 characters long.
backup.rule-1: Le-AI does not automatically sync any of your information, and all data is stored locally on the browser and device by default.
backup.rule-2: When using the backup and cloud sync features, Le-AI will use the local encryption key provided by you to encrypt and decrypt the data using AES.
backup.rule-3: If the key is lost, there is no way to correctly retrieve your backed-up data.

character.welcome-message-tip: The initial chat message to send to the user

chat.clear-all-context: Are you sure to clear all the context?
chat.clear-current-context: Are you sure to clear the current context?
chat.context-limit-tip: The default length of context carried during this conversation is 8. If you choose 0, there will be no context carried in each session, which is equivalent to a one-question-one-answer format.
chat.conversation-limit: Free users can only create up to 10 sessions
chat.delete-chat-tip: Are you sure you want to delete this content?
chat.threshold-tip: Effective with 'context constraints', if the threshold is exceeded, automatic summarization of context will be performed for content compression.

code.10001: Please log in or configure your API Key to use Le-AI.
code.10002: API Key missing, please check configuration or contact the developer
code.10004: Please configure Azure API Version first
code.20002: User does not exist, please register first
code.20003: You have already used this license key
code.20005: You have already used your free trial
code.20009: Your current plan does not have access to this feature. Please upgrade to the Premium or Team version to unlock it.
code.20010: Please configure Azure Resource Name first
code.20011: The maximum size for data backup should not exceed 1MB.
code.20012: No backup data found for your query.
code.20013: Your current backup capacity limit is 50 KB. Please upgrade to the Premium or Team version to increase the capacity limit.
code.20014: Currently, you can create a maximum of three Le-AI tokens.
code.20015: Your Le-AI API Key is incorrect, please check and use it again.
code.20016: Please enable the Le-AI token first.
code.20017: The current quota for Le-AI tokens has been exhausted.
code.20018: The current Le-AI token has expired.

configure.leai-api-key-error: Le-AI API Key is a string that starts with 'leai-'.
configure.leai-api-tip: Le-AI API Key is a generated token by Le-AI. Once configured, it can be directly used to replace the API Key of the official model.
configure.max-tokens-tip: Set token limits for each model response. These tokens are shared between prompts (including system messages, examples, message history, and user queries) and model responses. One token is roughly equivalent to 4 characters of typical English text.
configure.model-configure-know-more: Click to view detailed documentation if you have any questions.
configure.set-leai-api-key: Please configure the Le-AI API Key.
configure.temperature-tip: Higher values will make the output more random, while lower values will make the output more focused and more deterministic.

plugin.google-search-free: During the testing period, you can use it for free without configuring API KEY.
plugin.introduction-1: This plugin allows the AI assistant to search for information in real-time from the internet using the Google Search API.
plugin.introduction-2: Example: When did Twitter change its name to 'X'? How is the weather in Chengdu now?

points.desc-1-2: Get an extra 330,000 points for Premium
points.desc-2-2: Get an extra 700,000 points for Premium

premium.enter-license-key-to-lock-features: Enter Le-AI License Key to unlock all the features.
premium.premium-3: Unlock all features, Mac and Win Client in the future
premium.premium-4: Support for models such as GPT-4, Claude, PaLM, and Llama 2.
premium.premium-5: Support for Google search and other plugin functions.
premium.premium-8: Lifetime license. Support our future development

prompt.get-title: What would be a short and relevant title for this chat? You must strictly answer with only the title, no other text is allowed.
prompt.summarize: Briefly summarize this dialogue as a prompt for future context, keeping it within 200 characters.
prompt.summarize-previous: This is a summary of the previous chat history, as a preface:

share.not-exist: Shared content does not exist or has expired, you can click on the button on the upper right corner to return to the homepage and start a new chat.
share.share-created: You have successfully created a sharing link for the current session.
share.share-delete-tip: All unattended sharing links will be automatically cleared after 7 days.
share.share-logged-user-tip: Logged-in users can view and manage their shared links in their personal center after sharing the session link.

token.how-to-cost-1: Any content related to a chat conversation will incur conversation costs.
token.how-to-cost-2-1: All costs are "estimated values" calculated by
token.how-to-cost-3: Each language model has its own pricing, and the corresponding official website has a detailed description of the pricing.
token.how-token-work-1: It is calculated according to the rules of each language model based on the total length of the current session content.
token.how-token-work-2: When the conversation reaches a certain length, you will no longer be able to add any more messages to the conversation. This is a contextual limit on the conversation content of each language model.
token.how-token-work-3: For example, GPT-3.5 allows a maximum of 4,096 tokens per session. GPT-4 allows a maximum of 8,192 tokens per session in its 8K model, and a maximum of 32,768 tokens in its 32K model. The context length limit may increase for various language models in the future.
token.how-token-work-4: If the current conversation reaches the context limit, you can delete some of the conversation content or start a new conversation to continue chatting.
token.token-desc: Tokens areÂ the basic unit thatÂ LLM models use to compute the length of a text. They are groups of characters, which sometimes align with words, but not always. In particular, it depends on the number of characters and includes punctuation signs or emojis.

tts.auto-play-tip: Play the audio automatically after each reply
tts.voice-tip: Choosing en voice may not play Chinese properly.

welcome.desc: Le-AI is an open-source project that helps you improve your learning, work, and life efficiency by providing various AI models.

zLog.full-log: Click to view the full update log

zLog.text2: Support unlimited sessions, and adjust the coherence of session by modifying the threshold of content summarization in session settings
